thread.title: Harvard Law Professor Who Taught Obama Drops a BOMB: “His Wife Should Have Been President”
thread.title_full: Harvard Law Professor Who Taught Obama Drops a BOMB: “His Wife Should Have Been President”

author: John S. Roberts
title: Harvard Law Professor Who Taught Obama Drops a BOMB: “His Wife Should Have Been President”
text:
The wrong Obama was elected president. 
This, according to a Harvard Law professor who taught both Barack and Michelle. 
Charles Ogletree believes Michelle “was better.” 
Well, anything would’ve been better than Barack, though, right? 
Probably even Michelle. 
From BizPac Review : 
“You know, his wife should have been president. Absolutely,” the professor said. “He was great too, but she was better.” 
“She could easily be president, but I don’t think she will,” Ogletree added, to the dismay of millions on the right. 
Michelle is not too fond of politics according to the former president, who once said she told him it was “just a big mess.” 
Something tells me Barack might cry himself to sleep tonight. 
Oh, well. He made America cry for eight straight years. 
The scary thought here is what if Michelle decides to run for office in the near future? 
Another Obama in politics sounds terrifying. LIKE this article?
